mapper.sql: id, cust_id, cust_name, visit_name, cust_relation, visit_date, end_date, vist_address, vist_item, cust_req, cust_answer, tenant_code, remark, is_deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time
mapper.select:
SELECT ccv.id, ccv.cust_id, ccv.cust_name, ccv.visit_name, ccv.cust_relation, ccv.visit_date, ccv.end_date, ccv.vist_address, ccv.vist_item, ccv.cust_req, ccv.cust_answer, ccv.tenant_code, ccv.remark, ccv.is_deleted, ccv.create_by, ccv.create_time, ccv.update_by, ccv.update_time, GROUP_CONCAT( ccvru.userName ) userNames FROM crm_credit_visit ccv LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ccvr.visit_id as visitId, su.name as userName, ccvr.is_deleted from crm_credit_visit_role ccvr LEFT JOIN sys_user su on ccvr.user_id= su.id where ccvr.is_deleted=0 ) ccvru on ccv.id=ccvru.visitId
ccv.is_deleted=0 and ccvru.is_deleted=0
and ccv.cust_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{crmCreditVisit.custName},'%')
and ccv.create_time between #{crmCustomerRisk.creationTimeOne} and #{crmCustomerRisk.creationTimeTwo}
group by ccv.id ORDER BY ccv.create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE crm_credit_visit SET is_deleted = 1 ,update_by = #{username}, update_time = now() WHERE id = ${id} AND is_deleted = 0
mapper.select: SELECT ccv.id, ccv.cust_id, ccv.cust_name, ccv.visit_name, ccv.cust_relation, ccv.visit_date, ccv.end_date, ccv.vist_address, ccv.vist_item, ccv.cust_req, ccv.cust_answer, ccv.tenant_code, ccv.remark, ccv.is_deleted, ccv.create_by, ccv.create_time, ccv.update_by, ccv.update_time, GROUP_CONCAT( ccvr.user_id ) userIds FROM crm_credit_visit ccv LEFT JOIN crm_credit_visit_role ccvr on ccv.id=ccvr.visit_id where ccv.is_deleted=0 and ccv.id=#{id} group by ccv.id
